overview: To celebrate their tenth anniversary, and as the final episode in the METAL RESISTANCE, BABYMETAL performed ten shows at the iconic Nippon Budokan. This concert video is taken from the seventh and eighth of these shows.  01. IN THE NAME OF  02. Distortion (feat. Alissa White-Gluz)  03. PA PA YA!! (feat. F.HERO)  04. Gimme Chocolate!!  05. Doki Doki â˜† Morning  06. BxMxC  07. Brand New Day (feat. Tim Henson and Scott LePage)  08. Megitsune  09. KARATE  10. Headbangeeeeerrrrr!!!!!  11. Road of Resistance  12. THE ONE  13. Ijime, Dame, Zettai
title: 10 BABYMETAL BUDOKAN - DOOMSDAY VII & VIII
